assignments.title: Math Detective: Addition
assignments.description:
##LEARNING##
Addition is a way to put numbers together! When you add, you count how many things you have in total after joining them. We use a plus sign (+) to show we are adding, and an equals sign (=) to show the answer. For example, if you have 2 cookies and get 3 more, you add them to get 5 cookies!

##QUIZ##
1. What is 2 + 3?  1) 4  2) 5*  3) 62. What is 4 + 1?  1) 3  2) 4  3) 5*3. What is 5 + 5?  1) 8  2) 9  3) 10*4. What is 6 + 2?  1) 7  2) 8*  3) 95. What is 7 + 0?  1) 0  2) 7*  3) 86. What is 3 + 4?  1) 6  2) 7*  3) 87. What is 1 + 8?  1) 7  2) 8  3) 9*
